attributes.action: Lift the photo and filming ban policy which some schools have in effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some schools have a no photo or filming policy.
This policy is reported to be partly to protect children who are subject of court orders at the school and partly for general child protection reasons.
We as parents and guardians request, that instead of puting the weight of other childrens difficult siuations onto every one elses shoulders, and instead of letting paedophiles rule our lives, that schools practise a fair and common sense policy concerning photos and filming in schools, to enable parents and guardians to record these mile stones in our family lives.
